SiteNameAddress: JD Hotchkiss Ltd, London Road, West Kingsdown
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
Notes:
Potential contamination issues to be resolved.
As the site is in existing employment use it would need to be
demonstrated that the use is no longer suitable, feasible or viable and
that there is no reasonable prospect of the continued business use in
the longer term.

SiteNameAddress: Middle Farm Nursery, Cray Road, Crockenhill
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
Notes:
Additional information on site layout and massing is required alongside
an assessment of the impact on the listed buildings.
Site reduced to previously developed land and locally defined
brownfield land only.
As the site is in existing employment use it would need to be
demonstrated that the use is no longer suitable, feasible or viable and
that there is no reasonable prospect of the continued business use in
the longer term.

SiteNameAddress: College Road Nurseries, College Road, Hextable
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
Notes:
It is important to retain the gap between Hextable and Swanley and to
avoid encroachment here. Overall the southern portion of the site
containing permanent buildings and glasshouses is considered able to
accommodate development. Site reduced to previously developed land
only.

SiteNameAddress: Highways Depot, Tonbridge Road, Chiddingstone Causeway
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
Notes:

Notes:
Additional information on site layout and massing is required alongside

SiteNameAddress: Gills Farm, Gills Road, South Darenth
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
Notes:
Support retention of the existing tourist accommodation and
commercial workshops as part of the wider scheme.
If a wholly residential scheme is proposed, as part of the site is in
existing employment and tourist accommodation use, it would need to
be demonstrated that the use is no longer suitable, feasible or viable
and that there is no reasonable prospect of the continued business use
in the longer term.

SiteNameAddress: Terrys Lodge Farm, Terrys Lodge Road, Wrotham
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
Notes:
Part of the site has been granted permission for conversion of existing
grain store to 3 residential dwellings.
Additional information on site layout and massing of the proposal is
required alongside an assessment of the impact on the listed building.

SiteNameAddress: Kent & Surrey Driving Range, Crouch House Road, Edenbridge

Notes:

Notes:
Site reduced to previously developed land and locally defined

OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority

SiteNameAddress: Sevenoaks Hospital, Hospital Road, Sevenoaks
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
Notes:
The western parcel lies within an air quality management area and any
development proposal would be subject to an air quality assessment.
There are some concerns over amenity impact for neighbouring
properties which could be addressed through high quality design.
The loss of health facilities will need to be addressed.

SiteNameAddress: Calcutta Club and Polhill Business Centre, London Road, Badgers Mount
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
Notes:
As the site is in existing employment use it would need to be
demonstrated that the use is no longer suitable, feasible or viable and
that there is no reasonable prospect of the continued business use in
the longer term.
Any new development would need to assess the potential impact on
the adjoining local wildlife site and ancient woodland and a 10m buffer
is likely to be required.

SiteNameAddress: The Manor House, North Ash Road, New Ash Green
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority

B1(a) office floorspace should be included as part of the scheme to reflect existing use.
